about_the_game:
• Each hero rolls their own dice, and you can reroll selected dice a limited number of times.

  • Assign the selected dice to the characters, then take turns making your moves.

  • Use the coins earned from defeated enemies to buy new skills.

  • Assign these skills to your character’s dice, develop your character as you wish, and build your strategy.

  • Select a companion at certain levels.

  • Stack unused skills in the Energy Stone, and once it is full, use its unique ability.

  • Face bosses at the end of stages.

  • Continue your unique journey by unlocking new stages and heroes.

Unique Characters

  • Saint: Deals damage to enemies based on his own health points. Additionally, attacks a random enemy at the start of each turn.

  • Defender: A defensive hero with the unique ability to reflect damage through armor. Gains +1 armor whenever it grants armor to an ally.

  • Mind Breaker: Possesses the unique ability to control an enemy’s mind and make it perform an action on his behalf for one turn. Also has a percentage chance to put an enemy to sleep whenever he performs an action.

  • Thief: Can steal an enemy’s action and has a chance to dodge incoming attacks.

  • Merchant: Has the unique ability to deal damage based on current coin amount. Additionally, guarantees a coin drop from any enemy he defeats.

A little tip: You have plenty of opportunities to create combos! You can create combos with certain heroes and selected abilities. For example, by giving a hero the Invisible effect to make them untargetable, you can leave Defender as the only targetable hero. With its special ability to reflect damage, Defender can return all incoming damage to enemies, allowing you to eliminate them and clear the stage without taking any damage. Of course, you’ll still need a bit of luck to roll the dice you need!
